overview:
Gabriel is responsible for CGIâ€™s Banking team overseeing account management of all banking and financial services accounts

Gabriel joined CGI in mid 2007 and brings over 20 years of international business and IT services experience to CGI, primarily focused on the financial services sector. Prior to joining CGI, Gabriel held senior roles with Unisys where most recently he was Vice-President and General Manager for Mexico and Puerto Rico. Prior to that he led the substantial growth of subsidiaries in Philippines, Thailand and Peru. Before leaving Canada in 1995 he was the head of Information Services for the Financial Services industry at Unisys Canada.

Gabriel graduated from the University of Rostock in Germany where he received his Masters and PhD in Engineering. He was a member of the board of the Association of IT Companies in Mexico (AMITI) and Philippines (ITAP), and a board member of LARES Inc., a corporation involved in the computerization and operation of the Philippine land records management system.
